abstract: A campaign for a new skin lotion sought to map the social network of Kodiak, Alaska — to build an ad campaign around the person who was most effectively recommending the product to others.
snippet: A campaign for a new skin lotion sought to map the social network of Kodiak, Alaska — to build an ad campaign around the person who was most effectively recommending the product to others.
lead_paragraph: COMPANIES have been trying to create their own social networks ever since Friendster became popular. It was part fad and part marketer’s hope that customers were so devoted that they were dying to discuss shampoo or tires online.

headline.main: Spreading the Word (and the Lotion) in Small-Town Alaska
